alert.note: Alert for Northwestern Fremont County Above 8500Ft; Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft; Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Ft; Wet Mountains above 10000 Ft; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 21 at 2:09PM MST until February 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING HAS BEEN ISSUED FROM 5 PM TUESDAY TO 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 12 inches. * WHERE...Fremont County, the Wet Mountains and the Wet Mountain Valley area. * WHEN...From 5 PM Tuesday to 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
